HomeWiki:
Project Description
Protogamez WGM, is a game manager for Windows.

It is coded in C#, .NET Framework 4.5, using WPF interface and Access DB.

Protogamez WGM will lets you consult many different statistic about your gaming trend, let you start and backup game you have previously define in the software. The main goal of the software was to provided a common ground for all your game, DVD, HDD, Steam, Ubisoft Store, Origine. And track your game time and savegame backup all in the same Metro design interface.

  • The software documentation is currently in the process of being build.
  • Facebook page now available.
  • Metro GS interface public alpha release available, check for download here.

Feel free to provide feedback, I wish to help you enjoy the software has much has you can!
